comments.body: Can you add a comment with the link to the PR adding the license file for future reference so that next time there is an update the recipe can be updated?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@  home: https://github.com/DropD/reentry
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  # PR for including license file: https://github.com/DropD/reentry/pull/10
  #license_file: LICENSE
